model.name: DataServiceLayer
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW service( col1 integer NOT NULL, col2 string(50) NOT NULL, col3 string(50) NOT NULL, col4 string(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK0 PRIMARY KEY(col1) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'data') AS SELECT 1, 'first entry col2', 'first entry col3', 'first entry col4' UNION ALL SELECT 2, 'second entry', 'second entry col3', 'second entry col4' UNION ALL SELECT 3, 'third entry', 'third entry col3', 'third entry col4' ;
